item.description:
2021 MasterCraft X24 - 159 hours!

Super Clean, always garage stored. The X24—where power and performance meet refinement and poise. This award-winning vessel offers world-class wakes and waves along with premium comfort and an unrivaled fit-and-finish. With room for 18 people, 4,300 pounds of ballast, the X24 is loaded up to entertain, impress, and outperform on every level.

For almost 40 years Tillys Marine has been a SoCal wake boat and pro shop staple. We are proud to offer MasterCraft and Barletta and provide unrivaled customer service from our three locations to everyone in the watersports community.

Get ready to impress on the water with the NXT23. The NXT23 is specifically crafted to deliver best-in-class wake and wave performance and comes equipped with essential features, ample storage, and tons of comfort to ensure your summer is hassle-free and better than ever. The NXT23 is impressive and intuitive—designed with your best summer in mind.

item.description:
2025 MasterCraft XT22 T

Welcome to the XT22 T—the perfect fusion of timeless design and extraordinary performance. The XT22 T exceeds industry standards with world-class surf waves, unmatched quality, and endless options all in a 21’10” package. With its unique interior layout and traditional bow design, the XT22 T delivers ample room and ergonomic comfort for a crew of up to 14. Enjoy classic lines and extraordinary performance with the XT22 T.

For almost 40 years Tillys Marine has been a SoCal wake boat and pro shop staple. We are proud to offer MasterCraft and Barletta and provide unrivaled customer service from our three locations to everyone in the watersports community.

item.description:
2025 MasterCraft XT24

Get ready to turn heads with the attention-grabbing style and dynamic world-class surf of the XT24. One of the most popular models in the MasterCraft fleet, the XT24 overdelivers on all of the MasterCraft promises: world-class surf, unmatched comfort, unwavering reliability, and industry-leading technology. Coupled with the newest features like standard underwater exhaust and foil profiles, the XT24 is sure to deliver the most dynamic behind-the-boat performance with distinct MasterCraft style.

For almost 40 years Tillys Marine has been a SoCal wake boat and pro shop staple. We are proud to offer MasterCraft and Barletta and provide unrivaled customer service from our three locations to everyone in the watersports community.

2025 MasterCraft NXT22

The NXT22 delivers best-in-class wake and wave performance thanks to its ample ballast and MasterCraft’s SurfStar system. The NXT22 provides a spacious layout for your entire family with plenty of room for gear—boasting the industry’s most board storage. With the most intuitive and easy-to-use surf system, the most reliable craftsmanship, and the most comfort all around, the NXT22 is ready to make your next summer the best one yet. 

For almost 40 years Tillys Marine has been a SoCal wake boat and pro shop staple. We are proud to offer MasterCraft and Barletta and provide unrivaled customer service from our three locations to everyone in the watersports community.

item.description:
2025 MasterCraft XT23

The XT23 leads the industry in surf performance. As the choice of champions, the XT23 delivers the tallest, longest, and most symmetrical waves with unmatched push and customizability. MasterCraft’s SurfStar system truly shines on the XT23 as it can pump out the friendliest waves for kids or deliver waves for pros with maximum amplitude, pop, and length. Inside the boat, the XT23 boasts unrivaled ergonomic comfort, ample storage, and the renowned MasterCraft fit-and-finish. With attention-grabbing style and world-class wave performance, it’s no wonder the XT23 is the choice of top wakesurf athletes like Austin Keen, Jett Lambert, and Ashley Kidd.

For almost 40 years Tillys Marine has been a SoCal wake boat and pro shop staple. We are proud to offer MasterCraft and Barletta and provide unrivaled customer service from our three locations to everyone in the watersports community.

item.description:
2025 MasterCraft XT22

Enjoy world-class wakes and waves, unwavering reliability, and customizations that reflect your style and preferences—all with the XT22. This 22’ model boasts room for 16 and standard features like transom lounge seating, a transom walkthrough, and MasterCraft’s renowned fit-and-finish. With the ability to create your own wave, choose from the industry’s widest range of colors, and select your preferred options—the XT22 is the most customizable and reliable 22’ surf boat on the market.

For almost 40 years Tillys Marine has been a SoCal wake boat and pro shop staple. We are proud to offer MasterCraft and Barletta and provide unrivaled customer service from our three locations to everyone in the watersports community.

2024 MasterCraft XT24

Get ready to turn heads with the attention-grabbing style and dynamic world-class surf of the XT24. One of the most popular models in the MasterCraft fleet, the XT24 overdelivers on all of the MasterCraft promises: world-class surf, unmatched comfort, unwavering reliability, and industry-leading technology. Coupled with the newest features like standard underwater exhaust and foil profiles, the XT24 is sure to deliver the most dynamic behind-the-boat performance with distinct MasterCraft style.


For almost 40 years Tillys Marine has been a SoCal wake boat and pro shop staple. We are proud to offer MasterCraft and Barletta and provide unrivaled customer service from our three locations to everyone in the watersports community.

item.description:
2024 MasterCraft NXT20

The NXT20 has everything you need for endless fun—complete with signature MasterCraft wakes and waves, the latest in technology, an abundance of ergonomic comfort and convenient hinged-seat storage. Its 20-foot length make the NXT20 is easy to store, tow, and maneuver—making summer convenient and effortless for you and your family. 

For almost 40 years Tillys Marine has been a SoCal wake boat and pro shop staple. We are proud to offer MasterCraft and Barletta and provide unrivaled customer service from our three locations to everyone in the watersports community.

item.description:
2024 MasterCraft XT20


For almost 40 years Tillys Marine has been a SoCal wake boat and pro shop staple. We are proud to offer MasterCraft and Barletta and provide unrivaled customer service from our three locations to everyone in the watersports community. 


The XT20 is the most compact, stylish, and high performing 20-foot boat on the market. Equipped with SurfStar, plenty of ballast, and a distinctive hull design, the XT20 produces the most precise and adjustable wakes and waves you’ll find anywhere. The hull shape and layout bring a higher freeboard, allowing room for not only additional ballast but additional comfort and quality within the boat. Compact, sporty, and full of performance, the XT20 is modest in size but delivers the boldest of waves.
